attributes.action: stop local council,s  and to let people have their grave,s as they wish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to let people that have love one,s in cemetery,s to have their grave,s as they wish, as long as they are looking to them,i losted my son 4 weeks ago and i have been told to take everthing off that we have put on and my son was only 17 and had cerebral palsy and was our life and there are other graves in this cemetery like his but that,s ok
